thread.section_title: Libertel Gare du Nord Suede - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: An ideal hotel for a short break
thread.title_full: An ideal hotel for a short break - Review of Libertel Gare du Nord Suede, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Peter T
title: An ideal hotel for a short break
text:
Ideally located for the Gare du Nord and Gare de L'Est
Area is well served by the Metro and buses
Staff are very helpful and always pleasant
Rooms are comfortable and well equipped though some are quite small
Breakfast is a cold buffet with plenty of choice
We are planning to use the hotel again in the autumn
